heading: HB05624
0: AN ACT TRANSFERRING THE SEATS OF TWO (2) BRANCHES OF THE REGIONAL TRIAL COURT IN THE PROVINCE OF LANAO DEL NORTE TO BE STATIONED AT THE MUNICIPALITY OF TUBOD AND CREATING TWO (2) ADDITIONAL BRANCHES  OF THE REGIONAL TRIAL COURT IN THE PROVINCE OF LANAO DEL NORTE, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE SECTION 14(M) OF BATAS PAMBANSA BLG. 129, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "JUDICIARY REORGANIZATION ACT OF 1980", AS AMENDED, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
principal-authors: DIMAPORO, MOHAMAD KHALID Q.; DIMAPORO, ABDULLAH D.;
mother-bill statusstatus: Approved by the House on 2019-02-04, transmitted to the Senate on 2019-02-06 and received by the Senate on 2019-02-06 Substituted by HB08920
